description: Avantia integrates technology solutions for clients in the public and private sectors in the electronic security, intelligent video analytics, and IT infrastructure markets.
Axeso5 is an online game publisher and the first multi-player online games platform in Latin America, 100% in Spanish and free.
Ayannah provides affordable and accessible digital financial services to the world’s emerging middle class, many of whom are migrants and/or unbanked.
b-fit is Turkey’s first national chain of women-only gyms, using an effective franchising model to empower other Turkish women.
B2 is a communication and entertainment company focused on young people.
Kebab Turki Baba Rafi is a Middle Eastern-inspired fast food brand in Indonesia, managing 1,000 + carts, stands, and small store-fronts.
BabyTuto is an e-commerce business for baby and children’s products.
Balqees sources the purest, rarest raw honey from beekeepers and farms in Yemen and other countries around the world.
BAMfi provides technology and capital solutions to blue-collar companies. Todd, who was selected as an Endeavor Entrepreneur with this company, sold the business and now runs Rule 1 Ventures.
Band Industries is a music technology company building the next generation musicians’ toolkit.
Bankingly provides digital channels — mobile, online and conversational banking — to financial institutions that focus on low-income and underserved customers.

Banza is a “food innovation” company with the mission to take the foods people love and make them better by using more nutritious ingredients. Banza’s first product is pasta made from chickpeas – with double the protein, four times the fiber, and nearly half the net carbs of traditional pasta.

Baraka Group is a brand with over 30 retail locations in metropolitan and resort locations throughout Egypt. It operates in an array of different industries: optics, fashion, jewelry, and construction.
BasharSoft connects job-seekers with career opportunities through two platforms, Wuzzuf and Forasna, which cater to both the white collar and blue collar labor markets.
Bateriku provides car owners with easily accessible, high-quality battery replacement 24 hours a day via app booking, web booking, hotline, and social media.
Baydoner (“Mr. Doner”) offers consumers high-quality iskender doner at fast-food prices.
Bayzat is a Dubai-based HR, payroll and insurance solutions software provider for SME employers.

Bazaar’s suite of digital products empowers merchants in Pakistan to simplify and grow their businesses. The Bazaar retail app provides a one-stop-shop to purchase thousands of products for merchants’ stores and the company’s fintech products include a digital ledger for simple bookkeeping and faster debt collection, and a lending product.
Bedu is a blended learning platform intended to unlock the potential to learn technology, business and languages.
Beesline is a brand of natural personal care products developed and produced entirely in Lebanon.
